title: Wood Says $3,000 Is Ark’s Base Case for Tesla Shares
itunes:title: Wood Says $3,000 Is Ark’s Base Case for Tesla Shares
description:
Cathie Wood, founder and chief executive officer of Ark Invest, discusses investing in Tesla as well as her thougts on China from the Milken Institute’s 2021 Global Investment Conference.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
